official_title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to provide for inclusion of the services of licensed practical nurses under medicare and medicaid.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) and title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to include the services of licensed practical nurses under the coverage provided pursuant to such titles.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Social Security Act to provide for inclusion of the services of licensed practical nurses under medicare and medicaid.
